name: GrappleSurf
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

In grapple surf you play as Andy Evans a master heist-man.  You've pulled off a hundred heists and this one will be no different. Accept! Your hover board was sabotaged! The controls are busted and you cant turn or control your speed!

Luckily you've got your trusty grappling hook by your side! You Use it and your shotgun to maneuver through an arena of islands, collecting all the gems. But watch out! The cops are on the lookout for you!

Music was made by Munkie Beets  https://soundcloud.com/a-cardboard-box-99702191

I had a lot of fun making this :) Hope you guys enjoy it!

If the browser Build is lagging try downloading the windows version!
